description: In avrc_pars_vendor_rsp of avrc_pars_ct.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID: A-111896861

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9
